charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1101_0100_:
Carmine thought [Name:PlayerNickname ]
seemed bored, so she invited [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] to a battle.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_0400_: It seems Sinistcha approves of you, too.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_0500_:
Curious about my Sinistcha? It’s quite rare in
other regions, huh?
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_0600_:
You know how Kitakami is—there’s just
nothing there! At least, that’s what I think.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_0700_:
But for outsiders, the Pokémon that live there
might seem rare.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_0800_:
I met this Sinistcha in Kitakami when it was
a Poltchageist, then I raised and evolved it.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_0900_: For Sinistcha, Kitakami feels like home.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_1000_:
When outsiders showed up, Sinistcha and I
would teach them a lesson.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_1100_:
The same thing happened when Juliana
came to Mossui Town.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_1200_:
We gave her a first taste of Kitakami—to
see if she was worthy of entering the
village.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_1300_:
When me and Sinistcha team up, anyone can
come at us, and we’ll take them down!
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_1400_: Oh, by the way, did you know?
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_1500_:
Sinistcha has two forms. It can be either
Unremarkable Form or Masterpiece Form.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_1600_:
Masterpiece Form Sinistcha is said to be
highly valued among collectors.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_0401_1800_: Hehe! You really wanna know, don’t you.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_0402_2000_: Hehe! Do you think it’s Masterpiece Form?
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_2300_: Did you really think I cared it isn’t rare?
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_2400_:
To me, this Sinistcha is the most valuable
Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_2500_:
I think true value is something you decide
for yourself.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_2600_:
It’s way more important than what anyone
else thinks.
charaepi_ch0356_00_zeiyu/2301_1201_2800_:
If I’m the one raising it, even something
unremarkable will become a masterpiece!
